subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Franks statement is true,
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Everyone thinks they can just go hunting, there would be about three deer
left in the whole country by December 22nd, 2012. On the 23rd, all the dogs
would be gone, on the 24th, we'd eat each other.
 The whole warning thing is to get your head prepared for a sudden
transition to spirit.

 F-S

On Mon, Dec 6, 2010 at 11:03 AM, Adriana Jones <adrianamjones@...>wrote:

>
>
> All I know about 2012 worth remembering is that different people say a
> bunch of different cultures all point toward something happening in 2012...
> ****if**** this is true, then that's some crazy-*** **it, indeed!! The other
> thing I heard about it is that nasa-confirmed the sun's going to be throwing
> some temper tantrums worse than usual.... personally, if it makes the power
> go out, I'm all for it, our modern pace is way to fast, unnatural and
> stressful... as far as rioting and looting, I'll leave that to the idiots
> who still believe they can eat, drink and sleep money :) If I have to break
> my veganism at that point, I will be well justified in doing so, I'll be the
> first one out there hunting deer if I have to... and if a giant asteriod is
> supposed to land on my a** in 2012, then I'm not even going to worry about
> it till then, lol!
>
